If the undead is reduced to 0 [HP] the spell ends early. After 24 hours the Corpse or Bones return to their former state unless you cast the spell again.

description.regularText: For Duration: when looking through the object you will notice magical residue which inluds the following:

bulletPoints: Magical creatures (Elemental, Cosmic, Undead) or Magical Items.
You know if a spell is currently affecting a creature or object, you don't know the exact spell, but you know the discipline
ou see if a spell was cast ther recently. Spells linger for a number of days equal to their Arcana Cost, you don't what exact spell, but you know the discipline.

bulletPoints: It can't be a consumable or something similar to food.
The item has to fit in a [SPI] / 4 m Cube.
It can’t be hazardous on it’s own like lava or poison but can be a sharp blade for instance
The item lasts for the duration and has a faint shimmer of the Aether to it making it appear as an obvious fake otherwise it shares the same properties
If a complicated item is created like a specific key for a keyhole or a inticrite mechanical device. The GM might call for a [INT] [SPELL TEST] depending on the difficulty and the casters knowledge.
